text:
On Jetty/XP for 1.4-dev rev. 476806
Log into blog publication as user lenya with no blog entries yet. Go to File ->
Add new entry. This gives

An error occured.

No pipeline matched request: blog/authoring/feeds/all/index.html at <map:mount>
- file:/C:/Lenya/14/build/lenya/webapp/global-sitemap.xmap:314:105 at
<map:mount> - file:/C:/Lenya/14/build/lenya/webapp/sitemap.xmap:646:106

blog/authoring/feeds/all/index.html at <map:mount> -

text: It is reproducable on the zone demo.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
This issue still exists on a fresh install. Maybe one could remove the Blog
publication from the upcoming RC, as it seems a little unmaintained and this bug
effectively renders the blog useless?
creator: hubertus@groepper.com
hubertus@groepper.com
text:
(In reply to comment #4)
> It should work now.

it does, thanks for fixing it.
